metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40160 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** This record was originally reported by the oss-fuzz project who failed to consider the security context in which JXPath is intended to be used and failed to contact the JXPath maintainers prior to requesting the CVE allocation. The CVE was then allocated by Google in breach of the CNA rules. After review by the JXPath maintainers, the original report was found to be invalid.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> issue opened by fuzzer, may be related with CVEs CVE-2022-40157~40161 and CVE-2022-41852.

criterions.comment: libcommons-jxpath-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
